humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/2.' This means that two sentinel lymph nodes were assessed and both were negative for metastases. Therefore, the N stage is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for metastases (0/1). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
